review: Have waited for more than one hour ..waiting is somewhat difficult @ age of 70 ..way of replying  by some staff little bit hurting
patient_name: GOLDage Retirement homes, Deepti Sree Nagar Madinaguda

review: For my Dad's COPD and  his severe Asthmatic condition, we consulted Dr Murali Y at Srikara , Miyapur. Doctor is so proficient and handled with care & concern. Happy with Doctor's treatment and his analogy & application to the issue with constant updates.

In practo description it was mentioned that he is a general physician, but when we go there and paid the appointment fee, then we were told that he is pulmonologist, and also a general physician. But he is not looking into the problem seriously, and when we asked for the diet for that problem, he asked us to look in Google, if google is the solution why we have to pay around 800/-  doctor fee. And mostly the lab in srikara hospital very faulty because  they are charging high amount for the patient *** ********** **** *** ******* ***** ******* ** ****** *********** *** ****** ******** ** **** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ****** *** ** **** *** *** ** ******** ******** He doesn't give much time even he knows patient is suffering. A small motivation, compassion and smile on face work this doctor should know. He didn't care to visit my patient to see how he is doing after couple of days and  just relaying on the reports and prescribed medication. He should understand, a critically ill patient feels good and motivated when a doctor visits for at least a minute. I have nothing against this doctor as said earlier he may be good ** *** **** ****** *** ** ****** ****** *** ******** *** ** **** *********

Dr.Murali.Pulmonologist. I am completly satisfied the treatment given by Dr.Murali/Pulmonologist during inpatient in Srikara Hospital from 08.07.22
to 12.07.22 and very good nursing staff, supporting staff and also deitery
(food,tea etc) Dr.Murali is Freiendly person and smiling face with pleasing
words.

                                                                   TRK SASTRY.   ***********                                                       **** *** ************************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am completely satisfied with the consultation. I have been having acute severe Bronchitis and Acute Laringitis for the last 20 days. which I was not aware of. I have consulted a doctor from different hospital earlier and I wasn't advised for any test or any x-ray. as that doctor didn't gave me a proper treatment, I had to consult Dr murali. I m extremely happy that I came here. came to know about what actually had happened to me. the Dr. is so friendly . listened to very well and understood what issues I had. and explained me well about the health issues I had and how to get away from it. Was advised by the doctor to consult in next 15 days. **** * *** ***** ** ****
The experience with him was good. He listened and answered all my questions patiently. That made me so happy.
Doctor was good..but high waiting time..no point making an appointment if we have to wait for 2 long hours
there is no point in booking appointment through practo..I had to wait for approximately 2 hours for my turn....they told appointments are first come first serve, so there is no meaning of appt

we are visiting the doctor from 2017, root cause explanation. Treatment explanation  is excellent.
I am suffering from it for almost 20 days , after consultation him I got relief within 2 days. He understood my problem very well.
This is my fallow up check for my father. Seem we got side effects after medication due forocart usage. Probably there is a miscommunication.
Doctor has good experience...... he explained very well..... he gave time also...... he listen  my problem ....
Having 16 years of experience doctor suggest for 2D eco and Xray for gastric problem for my Son... Which was costing around 3200/- for first visit it self..
Doctor is very friendly. We r satisfied with treatment. My daughter recovered from dengue in srikara hospital during 4-9-2022 to 8-4-2022.
He has explained to satisfaction of patient. Given minimal medicine   Patient requires confidence that she will recover and that confidence was given by doctors
